description: Celebrate St. Patrick's day with this refreshing drink that will have your taste buds tingling in no time! The Basil Lime&nbsp;Daiquiri delivers bright, tart flavors of lime and basil to each sip. It has just enough flavor from the basil leaves and lime mixed into the rum base for balance—not too much so you can enjoy it guilt-free.
name: Basil Lime Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: ½ oz & 1 tsp. Fresh lime juice
Basil leaves and lime wedges for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Simmer water with basil leaves until reduced to 2½ tablespoons.
recipeInstructions.text: Simmer water with basil leaves until reduced to 2½ tablespoons.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain, then stir in light brown sugar and 1 teaspoon fresh lime juice.

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice, combine the basil-lime syrup with light rum and ½ ounce fresh lime juice. Shake.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with basil and lime.
